thread.title: KRISTI ARNOLDS

author: KRISTI ARNOLDS
title: KRISTI ARNOLDS
text:
This is my second order with name tag country and I have been very impressed both times. The product, plastic name tag with rounded edges, metallic finish and magnet backing was all done professionally and to me within a few days.
The only issue I had was trying to order two of the same product online. The order form wouldn't let me type in "two" so I had to email customer service who fixed it within 24 hours so I could proceed with my order.
I will use this company again in the future.
